news.title: What CCTV and drone footage tell us about the hunt for Kirk's killer

news.title: Labour MPs' growing fury over Mandelson appointment
news.summary: No 10 say Mandelson was sacked after new information about his links to Jeffrey Epstein came to light.

news.summary: The Duke of Sussex said he wanted to do "everything possible" to help the recovery of military personnel injured in the war with Russia.

news.summary: For years Michelle and John Wylie were puzzled about the presence of a mysterious tall man in a blue suit at their wedding.

news.title: Oxford Union president-elect condemned for Charlie Kirk comments
news.summary: Student George Abaraonye posted on social media after news of the shooting broke, seeming to welcome the attack, according to media reports.

news.summary: BBC Verify asked experts, in the UK and elsewhere, if Israel’s actions in Gaza have been proportionate.

news.title: Man jailed for gangland shooting that left girl, 9, with bullet in brain
news.summary: Javon Riley is jailed for 34 years over his role in the shooting of a girl at a restaurant in east London.

news.title: North Korea executing more people for watching foreign films and TV, UN finds
news.summary: The report is based on more than 300 interviews with escapees from Kim Jong Un's secretive regime.

news.title: The secrets to tackling fussy eating habits
news.summary: Fussy eating is very common. A child and baby nutritionist shares her tips on how to manage it.
